metadata.name: EXOPLANET_001
metadata.description:
A collection of 10 surreal photographs, reminiscent of otherworldly planets and moons.
 
The series was photographed on a glacier lit with fireworks. All captured in-camera with no digital manipulation.

All the works in the series are verified by Verisart and includes an individual Certificate of Authenticity on the blockchain transferrable to the collector. â€¨

Verisart certificate of authenticity:
https://verisart.com/works/thor-elias-engelstad-c118883a-f12a-499c-bf1f-9cf8934ebe52
